Class: TurtleRenderData

TurtleRenderData(rootopt)

Represents the rendering Data for Turtle components. This class manages references, bindings, and events for rendering.

Constructor

new TurtleRenderData(rootopt)

Creates an instance of TurtleRenderData.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
root DocumentFragment <optional>

The root element for rendering. Defaults to a new DocumentFragment.

Classes

TurtleRenderData

Methods

addBinding(state, configs)

Adds a binding for a specific state.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
state string

The name of the state to bind.
configs Object

Configuration object for the binding, which may include callback functions or parameters.

getRef(name) → {HTMLElement}

Retrieves a referenced DOM element by its unique name.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The unique name for the reference.
Throws:

Throws an error if no reference with the given name exists.

Type
Error
Returns:
  • The referenced DOM element.
Type
HTMLElement

removeRef(name)

Removes a reference by its unique name.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The unique name for the reference to remove.
Throws:

Throws an error if no reference with the given name exists.

Type
Error
